Reviews.Title: Lasts about 1 year if you use it a lot
Reviews.Author: Linda
Reviews.Content: Review:The phone is ok. It does what a phone should do and the slide out keyboard is OK. Some phones have very hard keys and some do not. The camera is only 2.1 mp so it is not good and does not have flash so the picture quality is not good. It does have a slot for a microSD card which is nice for putting ring tones and picture on the phone. Overall, I would not recommend getting the phone from Costco but it is not that bad of a phone for not being a smartphone.My experience with the phone:My family and I got ours through Costco and also had a 2 year warranty on it. However, after one year they started to have issues. My sisters would freeze and she could not answer calls while the screen was frozen. It stayed like that for around 30 seconds. So we went back to Costco and they replaced it the first time. Then, my mom's has a problem where she could not hear the other person speaking but she could talk to them. We went back to Costco and this time we had to send it back to T-mobile for $10 (shipping). Now, after the year was over, my mom's phone broke again and would not turn on, even after charging for hours. We called T-mobile and they said they do not carry this phone anymore so we would have to pay $70 for a new phone. The warranty said it would fix the phones if it had hardware issues. So why did T-mobile not fix it for that $10.So, Costco service is not so good. T-mobile customer service and warranty are not credible because they do not honor what the warranty states.

Reviews.Title: Great phone
Reviews.Author: kimbies
Reviews.Content: Great phone.  So good that we replaced the phone my daughter used for 2 plus years with the same phone.  She was pretty hard on the phone and she loved the keyboard and she wanted the same phone again.

Reviews.Title: easy to use, does what a phone is supposed to do
Reviews.Author: KellyK
Reviews.Content: i have had this phone for a year. Works fine. Easy to use, easy to text, and make calls. Camera is ok, not horrible but not as clear as the newer phones. Easy to use internet. I did not have any problems with the speaker phone or hearing callers. At times, i would have problems of reception due to having tmobile and being in areas without reception, but overall this is a good phone. Very durable and has a long battery life.

Reviews.Title: Dropped calls every 2 minutes
Reviews.Author: G Anjelica "SHOES SHOES! Goddess"
Reviews.Content: No matter who I called or called me. Calls all dropped within 2 mins. Would have sent this piece of crap back. Didn't try it past the return time. ERR I was just so busy. My service provider told me they would look at for me. I have yet to get in to do that.

Reviews.Title: Samsung phone
Reviews.Author: lovesamazon
Reviews.Content: While this may not be the most technical phone in the world, it works great for preteens and teens who want the basics.  It does get internet and has a camera as well.  The color is plum with mauve trim and it is sparkly in sunlight.

Reviews.Title: great service
Reviews.Author: mokiblue1
Reviews.Content: Product came quickly and as described! Was very pleased with the overall purchase that I bought 2 more. Great service!

Reviews.Title: My favorite Dumb phone
Reviews.Author: Mary Heimerman
Reviews.Content: I've bought several of these for my family.  We are not into data or smart phones, but we text constantly.  It is reliable, tough and very convenient.Cons: the slider design means that eventually you will need to get the cable repaired, but the good thing is that it is available and repairable; the camera stinks.I was very happy to find my favorite "dumb" phone for a reasonable refurb price.

Reviews.Title: very good quality
Reviews.Author: kd
Reviews.Content: my sister and i bought this phone for my mom and she loves it! Very good started phone for someone who does not know cell phones very well..lol

Reviews.Title: a great texting phone
Reviews.Author: Dave
Reviews.Content: this phone is great for texting with a keyboard.  I do not need a smart phone but this compact slide out keyboard phone is just perfect for my needs.

Reviews.Title: Some buttons don't work well.
Reviews.Author: amy
Reviews.Content: This phone is overall ok. The keyboard doesn't work really well so it takes time to text since you need correct wrong taping.

Reviews.Title: don't need data plan
Reviews.Author: A. T. Azares
Reviews.Content: Not everyone needs a data plan, just basic phone calls, picture and text messaging. Dual keyboards, one is a full querty. This is a phone that would be ideal and excellent for that purpose.

Reviews.Title: Works as described
Reviews.Author: T. Adams
Reviews.Content: I have a family member who refuses to get a smart phone. But loves this phone. Works great for Non-techies

Reviews.Title: Not a good experience
Reviews.Author: Smily
Reviews.Content: This phone was supposed to be a new phone but for my surprise it wasn't. It stop working 3 days later. It's a pretty nice phone but I'm very dissapointed. The shipping time was amazing I received the item 2 days after I submitted my order.Now I had to sent it back to get a refund and hopefully I won't have any problems with that. iF you order this phone make sure you get your money's worth. Good Luck!!

Reviews.Title: Good average phone
Reviews.Author: A. Zumwalt
Reviews.Content: I have had this phone for almost two years. I do not have the volume issues that was stated by the other product reviewer. I love it for texting, I would never use it to check email or surf the web. If you want to do those things, then I think you should get a smartphone. The color options are nice, since my husband has the same phone but in the pumpkin color. 2 years old and works great!

Reviews.Title: New Phone!!!
Reviews.Author: Lymaris Delgado
Reviews.Content: Cell phone was new!!! All materials were received (manuals, charger, etc.) in the manufacturer box. I received it on time.

Reviews.Title: WORST SOUND VOLUME ON ANY PHONE EVER!!! TRASH 4-PHONE REPLACEMENT JUST LOUSY VOICE CIRCUITRY!
Reviews.Author: Eric Redman
Reviews.Content: IF YOU HAVE THE EARS OF A DOG NO PROBLEM. IF YOU ONLY USE IT FOR TEXTING AND NEVER CALLS, NO PROBLEM!IF NOT, THIS PHONE IS TRASH!DON'T BUY IT!!!!YOU CAN'T HEAR WITHOUT THE SPEAKER WHICH IS WHAT THE MAIN VOLUME SHOULD BE, AND IS NOT. IT IS NOT DEFECTIVE CIRCUITY, IT WAS DESIGNED CHEAPER, WITH A LOWER MOUTH PIECE & EAR PIECE VOLUME!THE DESIGNER SHOULD BE FIRED. THIS PHONE SHOULD HAVE A STICKER, "FOR TEEN'S ONLY!HE DESIGNED IT FOR DOG OR TEENAGER, ONLY EARS!THREE OF MINE WERE TESTED--ITS JUST A BAD PHONE. I REPLACED 4-TO FINALLY SAY IT IS A PIECE OF JUNK. IT WAS HALF THE VOLUME OF MY MOTOROLA 690.  I HAVE HAD 20-DIFFERENT CELL PHONES OVER THE YEARS AND THIS IS TRASH! 40% LESS VOLUME THAN MY BLACKBERRY.THE GRAVITY 1 DOES HAVE A BETTER SOUND BOARD, AND I SWITCHED BACK TO IT FOR A NON-INTERNET, TEXT BOARD PHONE! IF YOU CAN'T HEAR BOTH WAYS, IT'S TRASH!
